text: A general question. Can you also email your customers. So not really target audience. In this case I want to inform customers about a price change.

Hi everyone!
I am trying to set up Integromat scenario (Deal stage in HubSpot changes -> New task in ClickUp is created).
But I have faced some problems. I am trying to connect webhook in HubSpot, but it does not react on any changes that I make in my pipeline. Does anyone know how can I solve this problem
I am setting up this webhook connection in my dev account, but I manage my pipeline in a different account, could it be the issue?
Would be grateful for some help

Hello everyone! Our team recently updated ‘contacts’ scopes as HubSpot recommended to all of us. However, currently, we see a problem that active users of our app cannot log in with new scopes until they remove and install the app again. If users do uninstall app and install it once again with new scopes, then old refresh token becomes invalid. What you can recommend? Thanks
